Question
========
What do the `>` and `!` prefixes do when typing in the Positron command palette?

Answerlist
----------
* `>` filters settings; `!` searches extension commands
* `>` opens the Terminal; `!` restarts Positron
* `>` installs extensions; `!` uninstalls them
* `>` shows files; `!` shows plots

Solution
========
Typing `>` limits results to settings, while `!` searches extension commands in the palette.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
